title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 06 May 2015 - XWiki

14:02 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
14:02 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
14:26 <silverdrop> has quit  
14:27 <silverdrop> has joined #xwiki  
14:38 <cjd> hey gd, thanks for looking at the document :)  
14:42 <gdelhumeau> adding API methods is a challenge indeed :)  
14:53 <cjd> oh yeah, we don't want to be compiling groovy classes, I tested that back in the cassandra days and it blows your permgen to hell  
14:54 <cjd> but I think it's ok to have an ugly syntax as long as it's easy to type/remember, something like   $obj.exec('funcName', 'arg1', 'arg2')  
14:55 <cjd> anyway I think what will make ludo happiest is if we just ship it one feature at a time  
15:01 <msmeria> has quit  
15:02 <gsmeria> has quit  
15:32 <OSIMasson> has quit  
15:59 <gdelhumeau> cjd: for velocity I think we can handle a "shortcut"; such as $obj.myfunction($param1, $param2) -> $obj.call("myfunction", $param1, $param2)  
16:00 <gdelhumeau> like $obj.value -> $obj.getValue() or $obj.get('value")  
16:05 <cjd> ahh great  
16:06 <cjd> we can do that in velocity and in javascript it's quite easy  
16:06 <tmortagne> by default no but with an uberspector that should do it  
16:06 <tmortagne> $obj.getValue() or $obj.get('value") shortcut is specific to "get" with only one parameter  
16:07 <tmortagne> it's not really a generic behavior  
16:07 <gdelhumeau> yes I wanted to talk about the uberspector but I didn't know the name of it  
16:08 <cjd> ahh ok, I knew it was possible with an uberspector... anyway we'll just do the simple stuff and we'll write that this is an option for solving that issue  
16:08 <cjd> function definition is complex anyway so we won't be tackling it first  
16:08 <tmortagne> uberspector can come later as improvement  
16:09 <gdelhumeau> yes  
16:09 <gdelhumeau> but it means we don't necessary needs to compile some groovy code  
16:09 <gdelhumeau> except for... groovy macro :)  
16:09 <cjd> yup, we can even ship $app.call('myFunction', $arg, $arg2) and wait until we have sufficient user demand to add the uberspector  
16:10 <gdelhumeau> sounds good  
16:10 <tmortagne> yep when you have the generic stuff you can always add helpers and shortcuts later if needed  
16:10 <gdelhumeau> the problem right now is that define a new function, in groovy, would need PR  
16:10 <cjd> often enough, the users really don't care about what we think they will, every time I'm sure a feature will be needed, I learn and everyone wants something different :)  
16:29 <silverdrop> has quit
